title: Airplane School: First Adventure to Canada
description: Mr. Sam, the teacher, is so lucky to have a class of 8 awesome, super stylish girls, each from an amazing country in the world.  They love to laugh, sing, dance, play sports, wear cool clothes and jewelry, try delicious new foods, and most of all, to have fun!  Join them as they learn about each other and the world on their amazing adventures!
author: Sam Menard
